altername_name: Eight Feet Under: A Hibernated 1 Addon
name: Eight Feet Under
overview: A stand alone text adventure that builds on the game Hibernated 1, not quite a sequel but the game as seen through the eyes of an unusual and rather unexpected protagonist: Vermin Extermination Unite 4, aka Vlad. Eight Feet Under reveals a previously unknown part of the Hibernated 1 events, so it is essential to complete the main game first. The add-on takes a much less narrative and more puzzle-oriented approach.
